title: 'Output size is too small'
body_html:
Hi,

Newbie to pytorch here! I am using the code form examples/imagenet using inception_v3 model,

    python inception_torch.py -a inception_v3 -b 1

I am getting this error message:

    RuntimeError: 'Given input size: (128 x 3 x 3). Calculated output size: (768 x -1 x -1). Output size is too small at /py/conda-bld/pytorch_1490977962696/work/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialConvolutionMM.cu:47'

Did not notice this error with vgg16 model.

Any directions on to solve it will be very helpful.
Thanks in advance!

body:
Hi, 

Newbie to pytorch here! I am using the code form `examples/imagenet` using `inception_v3` model, 

        python inception_torch.py -a inception_v3 -b 1

I am getting this error message: 

        RuntimeError: 'Given input size: (128 x 3 x 3). Calculated output size: (768 x -1 x -1). Output size is too small at /py/conda-bld/pytorch_1490977962696/work/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialConvolutionMM.cu:47'

Did not notice this error with `vgg16` model. 

Any directions on to solve it will be very helpful. 
Thanks in advance!
